name: You Are Petting a Cat
description:
/ᐠ .ᆺ. ᐟ\ﾉ This is a text-based game where you pet cats. /ᐠ .ᆺ. ᐟ\ﾉ

/ᐠ .ᆺ. ᐟ\ﾉ

I wrote this game in twine, and I was inspired by the cats I know. I don't own a cat, but if you want to donate to me I think that one day I can! I really hope you enjoy the game.  /ᐠ .ᆺ. ᐟ\ﾉ

~~ william
